Desc.eng: There is a well in the village, where the Ink seeps out into this world. An Inktide snatched away a bag of valuable components from me.
And how can I help you with that?
If you could climb down into the well and risk your life by looking for my belongings, Iâ€™d be very grateful.
I had a feeling that you would say that.
You say jump, I say... no.
I simply can't resist adventures like that. That's one of my flaws.
